Title: Round the Twist
Actors: Andrew Daddo, Ben Thomas, Brook Sykes, Bunny Brooke, Cameron Nugent, Frankie J. Holden, Jan Friedl, Judith McGrath, Katie Barnes, Lachlan Jeffrey, Mathew Waters, Nick Mitchell, Reuben Liversidge, Robyn Gibbes, Samuel Marshalnd, Stuart Atkin, Suzanne Chapman, Tamsin West
Plot: Tony Twist and his three children - thirteen year old twins Pete and Linda and nine year old Bronson - move to an old lighthouse on the rugged Australian Coast. They soon discover that the lighthouse, and the outhouse, are haunted.
